did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Biographical material, reprints and several editions of Hagan and Bruner's Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals, the seminal veterinary text authored by William Arthur Hagan and Dorsey William Bruner, et al.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, Japanese, Italian, and Spanish

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: James H. Gillespie is Professor of Veterinary Microbiology, Emeritus, Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Biographical material, reprints and several editions of Hagan and Bruner's Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals, the seminal veterinary text authored by William Arthur Hagan and Dorsey William Bruner, et al.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Veterinary Medicine-- Faculty.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: James H. Gillespie Papers, #24-02-3293. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: List of Corrections for Hagan, 6th edition
Hagan, William Arthur. The Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals. Ithaca: Comstock, 1943.
Bruner, Dorsey William and James Howard Gillespie. Hagan's Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals. 5th ed. Ithaca: Comstock, 1966.
Bruner, Dorsey William and James Howard Gillespie. Hagan's Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals. 6th ed. Ithaca: Comstock, 1973.
Bruner, Dorsey W. and James H. Gillespie. Hagan Malattie Infettive degli Animali Domestici. Italian translation of the 5th American ed. Faenza: Fratelli Lega Editori, 1973.

Timoney, John F, James H. Gillespie, et al. Hagan & Bruner Microbiologia e Malattie Infettive degli Animali Domestici. 3d Italian ed. Translation of the 8th American ed. Bologna: Editoriale Grasso, 1995.

Bruner, Dorsey William and James Howard Gillespie. Hagan Enfermedades Infecciosas de los Animals Domesticos. 3d Mexican ed. Translation of the 5th American ed. Mexico: La Prensa Medica Mexicana, 1970.

Gillespie, James Howard and John Francis Timoney. Hagan Y Bruner Enfermedades Infecciosas de los Animals Domesticos. 4th Mexican ed. Translation of the 7th American ed. Mexico: La Prensa Medica Mexicana, 1983.

Bruner, Dorsey William and James Howard Gillespie. [Hagan's Infectious Diseases of Domestic Animals.] Japanese Translation of the 6th American ed. Tokyo: Ishiyaku Publishers,
ca. 1975
.
